comments.content: I hear we have local sorghum syrup made in ohio, but I have not seen it yet.  I keep looking though.

comments.author: Shelly@Experimental Culinary Pursuits
comments.content: Oh wow, this looks delicious! I need to try making butter next time. The sweetness of the syrup and the heat of the jalapeno sounds divine!
